say: Thanks — I can quote in 60s. Which buyer type are you?
1) Retail  2) Distributor  3) Brand/Private Label  4) Amazon/Ecom  5) Project
Retail — got it. What’s your monthly target volume?
Distributor — which channel?
A) Offline wholesale  B) Key accounts  C) Mixed
Brand/Private Label — do you need OEM/ODM customization?
A) Yes  B) No
Ecom — which platform?
A) Amazon  B) Shopify/Other
Amazon — send your target price band + top 3 competitors on Amazon.
I’ll reply with a ‘hit SKU’ recommendation + packaging & compliance notes.
Shopify/Other — send your website link + target audience.
I’ll reply with 3 hero SKUs + bundle strategy.
Project/Contract — please send: delivery city + timeline + seating quantity.
We’ll propose spec + lead time window.
Recommended Tier: TRIAL (50-100 pcs). Lead time 15-25 days. Low-risk launch.
Send: model preference (mesh/gaming/standing desk) + target price.
Recommended Tier: GROWTH (200-500 pcs). Lead time 20-35 days. Mix-SKU supported.
Send: your monthly forecast + best-selling styles.
Recommended Tier: SCALE (1,000+ pcs). Lead time 25-45 days. Priority production windows.
Send: quantity split + required certifications (BIFMA/EN1335/etc).
Recommended Tier: PRIVATE LABEL (300-800 pcs). OEM/ODM + packaging co-branding supported.
Send: logo/brand guide + target positioning (mid/premium).
Perfect — last step:
1) Your destination port/city
2) Incoterm (FOB/CIF/DDP)
3) WhatsApp contact name
I’ll respond with MOQ + lead time + tier price range + next steps.
✅ Noted. Quoting now.
